name: Relics of the Fallen
description:
Relics of the Fallen is a dungeon crawler card game with roguelike elements.

Choose your hero and the dungeon you want to explore. Defeat monsters, collect items and relics throughout your journey. Your decision making each turn determines your survivability.

Features:
- 3 heroes.
- 50+ cards.
- 40+ relics.

Also available on Google Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.crescentyr.relicsofthefallen
